item.title: Roblox: King Legacy Codes (August 2025)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • All King Legacy Codes
  • How to Redeem Codes in King Legacy
  • King Legacy Tips and Tricks
  • Best Anime Roblox Games Like King Legacy
  • About the King Legacy Developers

The developers of King Legacy are constantly updating the game and providing many new codes. These codes have a significant impact on the experience, especially in the early stages of the game, as they offer a bunch of freebies, including gems, boosts, and cash. Roblox players can scroll down to see the complete list of King Legacy codes, as well as a guide to redeeming them, a list of other games like King Legacy , and information about the game's developers.

Updated August 23, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: There are plenty of codes to redeem right now, offering a wide mix of rewards such as Gems, Cash, Gold Keys, and even stat resets. Some also provide timed EXP boosts, giving you more flexibility in how you want to progress. Since these freebies cover different areas of the game, it’s worth making use of them while they’re active. More codes are likely to appear with future updates, so checking back here can help you stay up to date.

All King Legacy Codes

Codes Checked on August 23, 2025.

All Working King Legacy Codes

  • RainbowDragon - Redeem for 100 Gems (For redemption, you need the old Rainbow Dragon color)
  • DragonColorRefund - Redeem for 50 Gems (You will only get 10 Gems if your color was the original red)
  • SKGames - Redeem for 15 Minutes x2 Exp
  • WELCOMETOKINGLEGACY - Redeem for 20 Minutes x2 Exp

How to Redeem Codes in King Legacy

To redeem codes in Roblox: King Legacy , players must follow a few quick steps. To obtain some of the latest supplies from codes, they should input them correctly by copying and pasting the list provided. If a code doesn't work, they should double-check that the spelling is correct. If it still doesn't work, it has likely been redeemed or is no longer available.

  1. Launch King Legacy
  2. Click on the Settings button in the drop-down menu
  3. In the Settings window, click inside the Enter Code box and paste the code
  4. Click Enter to complete the process

King Legacy Tips and Tricks

To begin with, it is necessary to understand that players who want to achieve success must complete many quests. Players can find them in the city. A very important aspect of the game is the selection of enemies by level. Initially, it will be difficult for players to deal with enemies of a higher level, so choose carefully. Using additional skills such as Smash is also very important for victory.

Best Anime Roblox Games Like King Legacy

With thousands of Roblox games available, players often search for something new. The reason for this is that all games get dull over time, and this section aims to help players if and when this occurs. Below, they will find a list of the best Roblox games, like King Legacy :

  • Project Slayers
  • Anime Adventures
  • Shindo Life
  • Ro Ghoul
  • Zo Samurai

About the King Legacy Developers

King Legacy was created by a group of developers called Venture Lagoons. They are pretty popular, and their group on the Roblox website currently has 621K members. Unfortunately, King Legacy is the only game from these developers that is so popular.

item.title: Flex UGC Codes (August 2025)
item.description:
Flex UGC is a Roblox experience for buying UGC. You won't find game content here, as it's a marketplace where you can sell, trade, and buy items. Creators usually make packs of items and sell them. If you buy certain items, you can redeem codes and get more freebies. You can find Flex UGC codes in the list below.

Updated August 23, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Two fresh rewards have been added, giving you access to unique cosmetic items in the game. Alongside the many other options already available, these new additions expand the variety of styles you can unlock. Since codes like these can change often, it’s best to claim them while you can. Keep checking back here, as more customization options may be introduced in future updates.

All Flex UGC Codes

Working Flex UGC Codes

How to Redeem Codes in Flex UGC

In many Roblox games, it is easy to redeem codes. The same applies to Flex UGC . When you enter the experience, the option to redeem codes is literally the first thing you will see. Nevertheless, if you need a hint, you can use our guide below, in which we explain how to redeem codes in Flex UGC .

  • Open Roblox and launch Flex UGC .
  • After loading, you will immediately see a window. Click the Redeem a Code button.
  • In the field, paste the code from the list of working codes and click Redeem.

Remember that codes in Flex UGC can quickly expire, and it depends on many factors. Item creators may restrict access for some reason or simply run out of copies of the items. Therefore, redeem codes as soon as possible while you can.

How to get More Flex UGC Codes

There are many Roblox codes for Flex UGC and they are easy to find. They're posted on the board to the right of the spawn point, so you can look for them yourself. You can also use this guide too. We update it regularly so that you get the latest codes.

item.title: Best Open-World Games That Reward Player Curiosity, Ranked
item.description:
Summary

  • Some of the best open-world games reward curiosity with hidden upgrades and meaningful discoveries.
  • Skyrim's unmarked caves hold rich lore and quests for wandering players to stumble upon.
  • Elden Ring's interconnected world is designed to reward exploration with hidden treasures and unique encounters.

Open-world games thrive on the promise of freedom, but only a select few truly reward players who choose to stray from the main path. In the best of these titles, curiosity is not just indulged but actively encouraged through hidden secrets, meaningful systems, and world design that reacts to exploration.

Whether it’s uncovering powerful gear, unraveling buried lore, or stumbling into entire questlines, these games make detouring a vital and satisfying part of the experience. When done correctly, that extra exploration is met with more than just collectibles. Instead, players are treated to entirely new worlds to discover and rewards that are well worth the detour.

8 Far Cry 3

Exploration Yields Hidden Upgrades And Chaos

Far Cry 3
9 /10
14
9.0 /10
Released
November 29, 2012

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M for Mature: Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Nudity, Strong Language, Strong Sexual Content, Use of Drugs
Developer(s)
Ubisoft Montreal
Platform(s)
PS4, PS3, Xbox One, Xbox 360, PC
Powered by

Far Cry 3 blends open-ended exploration with a variety of emergent systems that reward curious players. Hidden objects, crafting materials, and skill points lie scattered across the map, encouraging detours and risky excursions, while investigating abandoned outposts or diving into hidden caves often yields significant upgrades.

The game's reactive systems, from wildlife encounters to unpredictable enemy patrols, reinforce a sense of discovery. Players who engage with side objectives, like hunting missions and treasure locations, will often find themselves better equipped for tougher challenges, giving a clear feeling of a world that wants to be explored.

7 The Elder Scrolls 5: Skyrim

Secrets Are Hiding Behind Every Corner

6 Images
6 Images
The Elder Scrolls V: Skyrim
9 /10
80
9.5 /10
Released
November 11, 2011

WHERE TO PLAY

SUBSCRIPTION
DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M For Mature 17+ Due To Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Sexual Themes, Use of Alcohol
Developer(s)
Bethesda Game Studios
OpenCritic Rating
Strong
Powered by

Skyrim ’s map is littered with unmarked caves that are full of loot and enemies for players to discover. There are also entire questlines hidden off the main path that keen-eyed players will be treated to if they decide to take a wander into the wilderness.

Many of Skyrim ’s most powerful items and richest lore segments lie in areas never touched by the main story, and the game ensures that inquisitive players are consistently rewarded for discovering them, whether through loot or unexpected storylines born from off-path choices.

6 The Legend Of Zelda: Tears Of The Kingdom

Exploration That Encourages A Few Extra Steps

The Legend of Zelda: Tears of the Kingdom
60
9.2 /10
Released
May 12, 2023

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
Rated E for Everyone 10+ for Fantasy Violence and Mild Suggestive Themes
Developer(s)
Nintendo
Platform(s)
Nintendo Switch, Nintendo Switch 2
OpenCritic Rating
Mighty
Powered by

Tears of the Kingdom expands on its predecessor by making player experimentation the core of exploration. Curiosity leads to creative problem-solving, whether using Zonai devices or manipulating the environment for traversal and combat, leading the player to discover plenty of extra areas that would otherwise remain untouched.

Hidden shrines, underground labyrinths, sky islands, and more are tucked in the game’s vertical layers, often requiring inventive use of powers to reach. Players who explore deeply will uncover secret weapons and entire regions not tied to the main quest, delivering an experience where the world actively responds to inquisitive minds.

5 Outer Wilds

Curiosity Is The Name Of The Game

Outer Wilds
9.2 /10
Released
May 28, 2019

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
E10+ For Everyone 10+ due to Fantasy Violence, Alcohol Reference
Developer(s)
Mobius Digital
Platform(s)
PS4, Xbox One, PC
OpenCritic Rating
Mighty
Powered by

Outer Wilds is structured entirely around exploration and inquiry. There’s no combat, XP, or traditional objectives, only the drive to uncover the mysteries of a solar system caught in a time loop. Every piece of progress stems from following leads, noticing anomalies, or asking the right questions at the right time, creating a unique loop that ties directly into curiosity.

Investigating strange ruins or tracking planetary events often unlocks new layers of understanding. The game’s non-linear storytelling unfolds organically, rewarding thorough observation and conceptual leaps. Every aspect of Outer Wilds , from the environment to the narrative, is experienced through discovery.

4 Sable

Discovery Without Ever Feeling Pressure

Sable
8 /10
9.0 /10
Released
September 23, 2021

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
e
Developer(s)
Shedworks
Platform(s)
PC, PS5, PS4, Xbox One, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S
OpenCritic Rating
Strong
Powered by

Sable strips away combat and danger to create a world where exploration is its own reward. Players roam a painterly desert landscape, discovering forgotten technology and communities with rich histories through smaller side quests and more personal encounters.

Much of the game’s charm comes from simply wondering what’s over the next dune. From hidden collectibles to snippets of lore, the game encourages players to slow down and savor the journey, rewarding curiosity not with insane weapons, but with a journey of introspection and admiration for the world.

3 Red Dead Redemption 2

Details That Appear In Any Off-Road Adventure

Red Dead Redemption 2
10 /10
168
9.5 /10
Released
October 26, 2018

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M for Mature: Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Nudity, Sexual Content, Strong Language, Use of Drugs and Alcohol
Developer(s)
Rockstar Games
Platform(s)
PS4, Xbox One, PC, Stadia
OpenCritic Rating
Mighty
Powered by

Red Dead Redemption 2 ’s world is dense with emergent storytelling, where straying from the beaten path can lead to dynamic events, unique strangers, or hidden treasure maps. The world is incredibly responsive to everything the player does, and those who explore deeply can uncover lore-rich locations and narrative vignettes.

Even small visual cues, like smoke in the distance or a curious structure, often lead to substantial side content. Rockstar’s attention to environmental detail here ensures that the world feels alive and rewards persistent explorers with rare encounters and memorable moments.

2 Elden Ring

Absurd Underground Caverns And Treasures Beyond Belief

6 Images
6 Images
Elden Ring
10 /10
69
9.1 /10
Released
February 25, 2022

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL
PHYSICAL

ESRB
M for Mature: Blood and Gore, Language, Suggestive Themes, Violence
Developer(s)
From Software
Platform(s)
PC, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series S, Xbox Series X
OpenCritic Rating
Mighty
Powered by

Elden Ring ’s massive, interconnected world is meticulously designed to reward exploration. Hidden dungeons, optional bosses, and powerful items are tucked into the world’s forgotten corners, often without markers or prompts. This means that, at any moment, the player could stumble upon an entirely different world and uncover hours of additional content to enjoy.

The game avoids handholding, allowing players to chart their own course, and there are so many scenarios where discovering a seemingly innocuous cave can lead to a multi-stage questline or a pivotal item. The game's open-ended structure encourages players to think laterally and explore thoroughly, rewarding intuition with game-changing finds.

1 The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt

A Narrative That Unfolds Through Exploring

The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
9 /10
55
9.5 /10
Released
May 19, 2015

WHERE TO PLAY

DIGITAL

ESRB
M for Mature: Use of Alcohol, Blood and Gore, Intense Violence, Nudity, Strong Language, Strong Sexual Content
Developer(s)
CD Projekt Red
Platform(s)
Nintendo Switch, PC, PlayStation 4, PlayStation 5, Xbox One, Xbox Series X, Xbox Series S
OpenCritic Rating
Mighty
Powered by

The Witcher 3 elevates curiosity into a narrative tool. Optional side quests often match or exceed the main storyline in quality, providing moral complexity and impactful outcomes, and even just wandering into a village may unlock a multi-hour story arc that completely recontextualizes the world.

Points of interest across the map aren’t just filler; they’re often tied to lore, gear, or hidden character arcs. Even question marks on the map frequently yield handcrafted surprises, as the open world respects the player's curiosity more than almost any other RPG, consistently delivering meaningful discoveries.

item.title: Roblox: UGC Limited Codes (August 2025)
item.description:
UGC Limited is one of the few Roblox experiences that is not just a game for your entertainment, but a useful tool for marketing and sharing your creativity. Here, Roblox creators can generate their own codes that other players can redeem to get access to specific, limited-edition items.

We, in turn, have collected some cool UGC Limited codes that you can use to buy new cosmetic items. So, if you want to change your image but want more unique and rare things, this is one of the best options.

Updated August 23, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: Right now, there’s one new code available in UGC Limited , offering a unique item for redemption. Alongside the existing codes, you can claim a variety of cosmetic rewards like hats, horns, and other accessories. These codes give you options to customize your look and add some flair to your items. More codes may be added in the future, so it’s a good idea to check back regularly for updates.

All UGC Limited Codes

Working UGC Limited Codes

  • 59 - Redeem this code to get Item. (NEW)
  • 88 - Redeem this code to get Chicken Hat.
  • 801 - Redeem this code to get a Black Horn.
  • Sofa0 - Redeem this code to get Black Soga.
  • BUNNYEARS - Redeem this code to get Bunny Ears.
  • MP - Redeem this code to get Alt Defenders = Mid plate.
  • DRP - Redeem this code to get a Blue Card.
  • TRP - Redeem this code to get a Water Bar.
  • 876 - Redeem this code to get a Blue Hood.
  • TOD - Redeem this code to get a Health Bar.
  • LKY - Redeem this code to get a Green Sword.
  • R3DD - Redeem this code to get a Red Scythe.
  • NYAW - Redeem this code to get a Blue Hat with Horns
  • 404 - Redeem this code to get a Blue Item
  • RIP - Redeem this code to get a Tiger Hat
  • HDN - Redeem this code to get a Dragon Hat
  • SWD - Redeem this code to get Blue Hood
  • 707 - Redeem this code to get Purple Antlers
  • rainglowb - Redeem this code to get Sapphire War Axe
  • Gel - Redeem this code to get Purple Devil Horns
  • DISCORD.GG/CAC - Redeem this code to get Messy Summer Boy Hair
  • ANOTHERCODEWOOO - Redeem this code to get Messy Y2K
  • THANKYOUGUYS - Redeem this code to get Hair
  • REDVALK - Redeem this code to get Reevalk Decal
  • RAINBOW - Redeem this code to get Rainglowb.
  • SKULL - Redeem this code to get Skull.
  • TRICKORTREAT - Redeem this code to get Trick Or Treat Head.
  • THISISAINFSTOCKJAMCODE - Redeem this code to get Jam Fedora.
  • Headphones - Redeem this code to get Cat Burger Pods.
  • Tie - Redeem this code to get Tie.
  • Hat - Redeem this code to get The Neon Tophat of Doom.
  • Cowboy Hat - Redeem this code to get Max.
  • Roblox - Redeem this code to get Star Shades.
  • Poke - Redeem this code to get Purple Noir Valkyrie.
  • Doom - Redeem this code to get Relaxing Pepper.
  • Love - Redeem this code to get Hammer of Friends.
  • Shock - Redeem this code to get DartSky’s Top Hat.

Expired UGC Limited Codes

Currently, there are no expired UGC Limited codes, so redeem the active ones as soon as possible to avoid missing out on rewards.

How to Redeem Codes for UGC Limited

Just like in most other Roblox games, redeeming UGC Limited codes is not difficult, and it is just one of the few actions you can do here. However, if you encounter any difficulties or something doesn't work properly, follow these instructions to figure out what to do:

  • Launch UGC Limited .
  • Pay attention to the top of the screen. There will be a button that says UGC CODES. Click on it.
  • This will open a new menu. There will be two big buttons. Among them, interact with the second one, which says Redeem Codes.
  • This will open the redemption menu. There will be an input field and a white Redeem button below it. Now, enter manually or, better yet, copy and paste one of the above-mentioned active codes into the input field.
  • Lastly, click on the white Redeem button to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, you will see a notification “Code successfully redeemed” and the limited UGC will appear on your screen.

How to Get More UGC Limited Codes

To find more Roblox codes, you'll need to follow creators who use UGC Limited as a tool to promote their UGC. Considering that the audience engagement in this experience is quite high, you can easily find a content maker whose stuff you like and get a code, or become a UGC creator yourself and share it with others.

item.title: Roblox: Murim Cultivation Codes (August 2025)
item.description:
Murim Cultivation is an incredible RPG where you will need to learn martial arts and meditation like a real monk. To become the best fighter in this Roblox title, you will need to devote a lot of time to learning techniques, honing your skills, and farming resources.

Redeeming Murim Cultivation codes will help you accomplish these tasks much faster. As a reward, you'll get a bunch of Race Spins and Aptitude Spins, which will help you customize your character to your preferences.

Updated August 23, 2025, by Artur Novichenko: A couple of new codes have been added to Murim Cultivation , giving you more Spins and Coins to use. These rewards can help you progress faster or try out different builds with ease. Since older codes may expire without notice, it’s a good idea to redeem the new ones as soon as possible. We’ll keep updating this guide so you can always return here for the latest freebies.

All Murim Cultivation Codes

Working Murim Cultivation Codes

  • WELOVEICE - Redeem this code to Spins and Coins. (NEW)
  • REWRITE - Redeem this code to Spins and Coins. (NEW)
  • 21kLikes - Redeem this code to Spins and Coins.
  • Update4 - Redeem this code to Spins and Coins.
  • Update4Delay - Redeem this code to Spins and Coins.
  • Update3 - Redeem this code to Spins and Coins.
  • Update3Delay - Redeem this code to Spins and Coins
  • 18kLikes - Redeem this code to Spins and Coins.
  • 3kCCU - Redeem this code to Spins and Coins.
  • Freshie - Redeem this code to Spins and Coins.
  • 14kLikes - Redeem this code to get five Aptitude Spins and five Race Spins.
  • Update2Delay - Redeem this code to get 500 Murim Coins.
  • 2kCCU - Redeem this code to get 200 Murim Coins.
  • Update1 - Redeem this code to get three Race Spins and ten Aptitude Spins.
  • GrowingCommunity - Redeem this code to get Race Spin and three Aptitude Spins
  • 1kFollowers - Redeem this code to get five Race Spins and five Aptitude Spins.
  • 20kMembers - Redeem this code to get three Race Spins and five Aptitude Spins.
  • MurimShutdown - Redeem this code to get three Race Spins and ten Aptitude Spins.

Expired Murim Cultivation Codes

There are currently no expired Murim Cultivation codes, so redeem active ones as soon as possible to avoid missing out on rewards.

Redemption of Murim Cultivation will bring you probably the most valuable resource in the game - spins. With the help of different types of spins, you can customize and design your character to suit your style, as well as adjust important stats to make it more powerful.

How to Redeem Codes for Murim Cultivation

If you're a beginner, you won't be able to redeem codes right after launching the game, as you'll need to complete the tutorial or skip it. Regardless of your choice, once you're in the game world, use our guide to learn how to redeem your rewards in this Roblox game:

  • Launch Murim Cultivation .
  • Pay attention to the top left corner of the screen. There will be several buttons arranged in a row. Among them, interact with the penultimate one with three lines on the icon.
  • This will open a menu with a bunch of buttons arranged in a row. Click on the first one with a shop icon.
  • By doing so, you will open the Shop. At the bottom of the menu, you will find the redemption section, which contains an input field and a Claim button next to it. Now, copy and paste one of the active codes mentioned above into the input field.
  • Lastly, click on the Claim button to submit your reward request.

If everything is done correctly, you will see a notification on the screen with a list of rewards received.

How to Get More Murim Cultivation Codes

Searching for Murim Cultivation codes can take you a lot of time if you don't know where to look. Luckily, we know and have even collected a whole list of links to official resources where developers share Roblox codes for you. So, just follow the links and carefully monitor each page to make sure you don't miss anything:

  • Official Murim Cultivation Roblox group.
  • Official Murim Cultivation Discord server.
